title: Attachments
description: Telegraph supports different types of attachments both from local files, remote urls and existing files on Telegram servers (using their file_id)

children.value: Telegraph supports different types of attachments both from local files, remote urls and existing files on Telegram servers (using their file_id)
Attachments methods only supports required parameters, optional parameters can be sent through Telegraph
Photos can be sent through Telegraph
Sent Photos can be edited with the
Animations can be sent through Telegraph
Sent Animations can be edited with the
Videos can be sent through Telegraph
Sent Videos can be edited with the
Audio (.MP3 or .M4A format) can be sent through Telegraph
Sent Audio messages can be edited with the
Vocals can be sent through Telegraph
Documents can be sent through Telegraph
Sent Documents can be edited with the
A location attachment can be sent through Telegraph
A contact attachment can be sent through Telegraph
An animated emoji attachment that will display a random value can be sent through Telegraph
Different items can be used as "dice"
When sending files, some options are available:
